title: Media Manipulation and Soft Power: Why Trump’s Cabinet Could Challenge Israel – with Alan MacLeod
description:
Trump has nominated many unqualified, yet loyal potential cabinet members, all of whom are staunchly, violently pro-Israel. Much of the liberal media in the days leading to the election has argued that a Trump presidency will be worse for the prsopects of Palestinian Statehood. But Is this true? Join us tonight on state of play to examine Israeli Media manipulation, the loss of image and soft power, and if a hawkish and unfettered Trump administration will actually serve Israel in the long-run.

Follow Alan Macleod on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/alan.r.macleod/?hl=en
Follow Greg Stoker on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/greg.j.stoker/?hl=en
